elements.name: ripeatlas.msm_id
elements.desc: Measurement ID of a RIPE Atlas measurement

elements.name: ripeatlas.paris
elements.desc: Value to control paris traceroute. 0 means standard traceroute.

elements.name: ripeatlas.description
elements.desc: The description of a measurement. Auto-generated if empty.

elements.name: ripeatlas.probe_id
elements.desc: Probe ID of a RIPE Atlas probe

elements.name: ripeatlas.traceroute_id
elements.desc: A unique identifier for a traceroute to match intermediate IPs to a traceroute

elements.name: ripeatlas.hop_index
elements.desc: Indicates the index of a hop in a traceroute

elements.name: ripeatlas.paris_id
elements.desc: Identifies a flow in a paris traceroute measurement

elements.name: ripeatlas.protocol
elements.desc: Specifies the protocol of a measurement. One of ICMP, TCP or UDP

elements.name: ripeatlas.probe_source
elements.desc: A string defining a set of probes to be used for a new RIPE Atlas measurement
